alert.note: Alert for Four Corners, Upper Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 1:43PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central San Juan County through 215 PM MDT... At 142 PM MDT, satellite data indicated a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Blanding, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. Heavy rain is expected along with frequent lightning. SOURCE...Satellite. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastland. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 191 in Utah near mile marker 55, and between mile markers 64 and 68. U.S. Highway 491 in Colorado between mile markers 67 and 69. U.S. Highway 491 in Utah between mile markers 3 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
